hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #diving experiment# is rewarded with #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path of #gold#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #3# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Ice Arrows Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: Did you know that you can reach the invisible Hookshot target before the fans room in Shadow Temple with just the Hookshot if you backflip onto the chest?

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.
